channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The opposite of a good idea…
item.description: might also be a good idea. The hard part isn’t finding proof before you begin. The hard part is beginning, knowing you might not succeed.

item.title: Women Are 2.5X More Likely To Demand Bold Climate Action
item.description: While the so-called strongmen divide and conquer, the climate crisis is escalating.

item.title: Barclays Down Again As U.K. Banking Pain Continues
item.description: Barclays bank customers in the U.K. are once again having problems making or receiving payments as the bank's app goes down.
